Author: loversalibi
Text: honestly? i don’t wanna assume anything but it feels very strange for your dad to say that to you. it sounds like he’s trying to make you feel guilty for like, being a human being who depends on him?

Author: HappierHungry
Text: "non weird"... no, that's still weird af... and super toxic by the sounds of it...  how old are you?  parents are *meant* to look after their kids, not keeping tabs on some pseudo-debt.
